title: Google\Cloud\Iap\V1\ReauthSettings
name: ReauthSettings
description:
Configuration for IAP reauthentication policies.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.iap.v1.ReauthSettings

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.max_age
params.description: Reauth session lifetime, how long before a user has to reauthenticate again.

params.name: data.policy_type
params.description: How IAP determines the effective policy in cases of hierarchial policies. Policies are merged from higher in the hierarchy to lower in the hierarchy.
